article_text:
Roman Petrenko – Saturday, 2 April 2022, 16:47

The Siverskyi Donets river is flooding, due to the burst dam in the Kharkiv region.

Source: Novosti Donbassa [Donbas News]

Details: The Oskil Reservoir dam was destroyed in the past few days. The river is flooding the lands to the south of the dam, and has already reached the towns of Studenok and Sviatohirsk.

Vitaliy Moroz, a Sviatohirsk Village Council representative, published a video of the effects of the Siverskyi Donets flooding across from the Sviatohirsk Lavra on his Facebook page.

I want to note that most of the foreign policy intelligensia here in the US is right on board with some of the assessments here about the changing nature of the material that Ukraine needs. It's a shift from what the West was providing before, but if the West expects Ukraine to sustain offenses it is going to need to supply equipment used to fight a conventional war, and not just the kind of equipment used to arm an insurgency.



Ukraine needs sustainable logistical and strike capability to fight a conventional war.

Drogi Wykopowiczu

w załączonym linku do Polityki Prywatności przypominamy podstawowe informacje z zakresu przetwarzania danych osobowych dostarczanych przez Ciebie podczas korzystania z naszego serwisu. Zamykając ten komunikat (klikając w przycisk “X”), potwierdzasz, że przyjąłeś do wiadomości wskazane w nim działania.
